ChapterShortDescription: Google Developers Group Calgary is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Calgary to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products.
ChapterLongDec: Google Developer Group Calgary is inspired by GTUG/GDG Family. We started our journey in January 2017. We are here to advance Calgary's developers, data scientists and cloud architects with their Google Cloud and Cloud Native technology, tools and frameworks and facilitate Building What's Next and Transformation of Legacy. We’re not satisfied until GDGYYC is a world-class developer community. It’s what we’re here to do.
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
